items.sentence: Mary fixed her hair in front of the mirror.

Tom tried to hide what was really going on.
I wonder why anybody would want to do that.
I'm certain that I'll win the tennis match.
If you push the button, the door will open.
I have a brother who's the same age as you.
This custom is followed in most households.
Tom died three days after he got to Boston.
Tom died just before the ambulance arrived.
